articles.title: Mowing lawn for 11 minutes a day could cut the odds of dying early - Daily Mail
articles.description: Short bouts of moderate exercise such as brisk walking, dancing, water aerobics or gardening each day could reduce the risk of early death, heart disease and cancer.
articles.content:
Cutting the grass doesnt merely leave your garden in tip-top condition it could just save your life.
Researchers claim one in ten early deaths could be avoided if inactive people mowed the lawn for … [+1351 chars]
